document.full_text: excited by the emergence of a new generation of players this season, roger federer said he would savor the prospect of playing one of them at the indian wells atp tournament.
document.title: new wave of young guns excites roger federer at indian wells
lines_and_colors: excited by the emergence of a new generation of players this season, roger federer said he would savor the prospect of playing one of them at the indian wells atp tournament.
